org.apache.storm.hive.bolt.mapper

Interface HiveMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelimitedRecordHiveMapper, JsonRecordHiveMapper

    public interface HiveMapper
extends Serializable
    Maps a backtype.storm.tuple.Tupe object to a row in an Hive table.
